questions.subject: StyleAligned Node
questions.question: What is the purpose of the StyleAligned Reference Sampler node?
questions.answer: The StyleAligned Reference Sampler node lets you reference an existing latent as a style reference.

questions.subject: StyleAligned Node
questions.question: How do you retrieve the latent to be referenced?
questions.answer: You need to perform DDIM inversion to retrieve the latent.

questions.subject: StyleAligned Node - Parameters
questions.question: Which parameters control the degree of style sharing in the StyleAligned Reference Sampler node?
questions.answer: The `share_attn` and `share_norm` parameters control the components of self-attention and normalization that are shared.

questions.subject: StyleAligned Node - Batch Align
questions.question: What is the difference between applying and not applying the Batch Align node to a batch of generations?
questions.answer: Applying the Batch Align node aligns the style of the entire batch with the first image generated in the batch.

questions.subject: StyleAligned Node - Installation
questions.question: How do you install the StyleAligned nodes?
questions.answer: Simply download or git clone this repository in `ComfyUI/custom_nodes/`. Example workflows are included in `resources/`.
